metadata.title: CVE-2022-2869 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: libtiff's tiffcrop tool has a uint32_t underflow which leads to out ofbounds read and write in the extractContigSamples8bits routine. An attackerwho supplies a crafted file to tiffcrop could trigger this flaw, mostlikely by tricking a user into opening the crafted file with tiffcrop.Triggering this flaw could cause a crash or potentially furtherexploitation.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
